document.full_text: polish authorities have ordered cup finalists legia warsaw and lech poznan to play their next games behind closed doors in a crackdown against hooligans in the euro 2012 co-host nation.
document.title: poland shuts two stadiums in hooligan crackdown
lines_and_colors: polish authorities have ordered cup finalists legia warsaw and lech poznan to play their next games behind closed doors in a crackdown against hooligans in the euro 2012 co-host nation.
